directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees and melt margarine in a 8 1/2 inch casserole dish. Mix all the ingredients together and pour into melted margarine which will then surround the mixture. Bake for 40-45 minutes until the top cracks and the sides are golden brown.
ingredients: 1 7-ounce box of Jiffy corn muffin mix
title: Cornbread Thang
